# HousingLoans

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of HousingLoans is to provide housing loan application data for the year 2017 in the state of Massachusetts.

## Installation

You can install the released version of HousingLoans from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("HousingLoans")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("justniice/HousingLoans")
```
